verses.verse: There is therefore <S%G686><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> condemnation <S%G2631><s%> to them which are in <S%G1722><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>, who walk <S%G4043><s%> <S%G5723><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> hath made <S%G1659><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> free <S%G1659><s%> <S%G5656><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> what the Torah <S%G3551><s%> could not do <S%G102><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> it was weak <S%G770><s%> <S%G5707><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> sending <S%G3992><s%> <S%G5660><s%> his own <S%G1438><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the likeness <S%G3667><s%> of sinful <S%G266><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>, condemned <S%G2632><s%> <S%G5656><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>:

That <S%G2443><s%> the righteousness <S%G1345><s%> of the Torah <S%G3551><s%> might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> <S%G5686><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> us <S%G2254><s%>, who walk <S%G4043><s%> <S%G5723><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> they that are <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> do mind <S%G5426><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> of the flesh <S%G4561><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> they that are after <S%G2596><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> to be <S%G5427><s%> carnally <S%G4561><s%> minded <S%G5427><s%> is death <S%G2288><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> to be <S%G5427><s%> spiritually <S%G4151><s%> minded <S%G5427><s%> is life <S%G2222><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%>.

Because <S%G1360><s%> the carnal <S%G4561><s%> mind <S%G5427><s%> is enmity <S%G2189><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G5293><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> subject <S%G5293><s%> <S%G5743><s%> to the Torah <S%G3551><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, neither <S%G3761><s%> indeed <S%G1063><s%> can be <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5736><s%>.

So then <S%G1161><s%> they that are <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5736><s%> please <S%G700><s%> <S%G5658><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> if any man <S%G1536><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, he <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> none <S%G3756><s%> of his <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> be in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, the body <S%G4983><s%> <S%G3303><s%> is dead <S%G3498><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> is life <S%G2222><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%>.

Therefore <S%G686><s%> <S%G3767><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, we are <S%G2070><s%> <S%G5748><s%> debtors <S%G3781><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> to the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, to live <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5721><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> children <S%G5043><s%>, then <S%G2532><s%> heirs <S%G2818><s%>; heirs <S%G2818><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G3303><s%> <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> joint-heirs <S%G4789><s%> with Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>; if so be <S%G1512><s%> that we suffer with <S%G4841><s%> <S%G5719><s%> him, that <S%G2443><s%> we may be <S%G4888><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> glorified together <S%G4888><s%> <S%G5686><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I reckon <S%G3049><s%> <S%G5736><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the sufferings <S%G3804><s%> of this present <S%G3568><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> are not <S%G3756><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> to be compared with <S%G4314><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> which shall <S%G3195><s%> <S%G5723><s%> be revealed <S%G601><s%> <S%G5683><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>.
